definition: surname Mi/name of an ancient state
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss

sentences.english: He closeted himself with his councilors.
sentences.chinese: 他與顧問們在私室裏密談。

sentences.english: Did you have a secret talk last night?
sentences.chinese: 昨晚你們有一次密談嗎？

sentences.english: I had a quiet conversation with my closest friend.
sentences.chinese: 我和我最好的朋友進行密談。

sentences.english: He is closed with the director for an urgent meeting.
sentences.chinese: 他爲一次緊急會議正和理事進行密談。

definition: lit. to share the same bed with different dreams (idiom); ostensible partners with different agendas/strange bedfellows/marital dissension
The Thirty-Six Stratagems, a Chinese essay used to illustrate a series of stratagems used in politics, war, and in civil interaction/all the possible schemes and stratagems
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: endgame/conclusion/outcome/final part of a chess game
